title: Carrie Brownstein | Late Night Chats: Michele Byrd McPhee & Yeji Cha-Beach
description:
Carrie Brownstein of "Portlandia" and the band Sleater-Kinney chats with Seth about the final season of the IFC sketch show she co-created with Fred Amisen. She then goes behind the scenes to talk about her early jobs with Late Night producer Kevin Miller.

Then, a brand new edition of Late Night Chats with Michele Byrd McPhee and Yeji Cha-Beach of the Late Night music department begins at 13:51.


LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
